txt.en: Huneric can be found at Adambel.\n\nYou should talk to Huneric.
'I will show those Mordorrim what for!'
'Those Black Númenóreans have not treated us Easterlings with respect!'
'I care not for this war any longer.'
Huneric, Lord of the Thíuda, has spied Easterling defectors roaming the Corpse-fields of Parth Daenath.
Easterling defectors can be found in Parth Daenath.\n\nYou should attempt to convince the Easterling defectors to turn on the Enemy.

'The Ghâzab Bôron is nearly here. I saw that horde with my own eyes, and I know the terror it will inflict upon our fighting men when it arrives. Rumour of its approach has already spread throughout the camps of this Alliance, and I fear word has also passed to the encampments of our foes.\n\n'Some Easterlings have departed their own camps. Do they desire to join the Storm of Wrath? Find them on the Corpse-fields and confront these Easterlings! Perhaps they can be made to turn back, and mayhap take up arms against their former allies.'
'You convinced a number of Easterlings to assist us?'
Convince Easterling defectors to turn on the Enemy ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You convinced a number of Easterlings to assist us? That is far better than the alternative, for otherwise their numbers might swell the ranks of the Ghâzab Bôron! The Enemy will not know who is friend and who is foe. Can it be that the greatest weapon might prove to be the sword of uncertainty? Still, I must say... a good, sharp blade can be useful as well!'
